short_summary: The Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) seeks to establish a pool of suppliers who have experience in conducting and implementing a Digital Automated Accessibility Testing Solution (DAATS) that will help users identify and remove accessibility defects and barriers on their digital environments.
description: A performance indicator could be ":identified number of Functional and Usability Tests results Successed". For more information, we will ask to status to L1
